title: Halo Infinite Multiplayer is OUT NOW!  - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.15.21
description:
Blessing and Time are joined by Mike to talk about the HUGE Xbox 20th anniversary news, Halo Infinite's surprise release, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Housekeeping

We just recorded our live reactions to Xbox’s 20th Anniversary Stream. It’s me, Andy, Tim, and Mike celebrating 20 years of Xbox. That’ll be up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames if you missed us reacting to it here on Twitch.

If PlayStation is more your thing: We’re recording PS I Love You XOXO later today and it’s our GTA Trilogy review. You’re not too late to write-in to Patreon with your questions and your own thoughts about the trilogy. Get those in and tune in to the episode when it goes live for everyone tomorrow on Youtube.com/KidnaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack

The Roper Report -
00:02:48 - Xbox is celebrating their 20th anniversary, a wrap-up
00:19:30 - Xbox Game Pass was originally designed as a rental service, Microsoft reveals - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:24:20 - Xbox Game Pass was originally designed as a rental service, Microsoft reveals - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:30:40 - UK Call of Duty launch sales are down - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:34:00 - Ad  
00:38:55 - From Saturday: GTA Trilogy chaos continues as ‘Hot coffee sex mini-game files’ reportedly uncovered - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:44:07 - Nintendo says it’s taking criticism of Switch’s N64 emulation ‘very seriously’ - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:50:20 - Private Division acquires Roll7 - Danielle Partis @ GiBiz
00:53:11 - Out today
00:54:20 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim and Gary
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
